name: cluster_1
description: Number of pupils in schools for visually handicapped students

name: cluster_2
description: Number of pupils in schools for auditory / communicatively disabled students: deaf, hard of hearing, severe speech difficulties.

name: cluster_3
description: Number of pupils in schools for pupils with physical and / or intellectual disabilities: very difficult learning, protracted illness with physical disabilities.

name: cluster_4
description: Number of pupils in schools for pupils with psychiatric disorders and severe learning and / or behavioral problems, chronically ill students without disabilities and students associated with university-associated institutes that provide assistance to children with complex learning, behavioral or emotional problems (*Pedologisch Instituut*).
